text:
Implemented pointers from today's lab:
-Be specific
-Avoid technical Terms
-Make it result centric
-Replaced "Returns" with "estimates"

Here are the before (left) and after (right) one-liners: 

 Thoughts? cc:@_buildspace 
Have I improved or was the previous version better :) https://t.co/EBLP2Xuvc6
